greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists the parts of the last section of the set of partitions of n in nondecreasing order.
comment: Starting from the first row; it appears that the total numbers of occurrences of k in k successive rows give the sequence A000041. For more information see A182703.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..23, flattened
xref: Triangle similar to A135010. Mirror of A207378. Row n has length A138137(n). Row sums give A138879. Right border is A000027.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 23 2012
